nodes.text: Estah Kloy was a female Human who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. She made her living as a personnel agent on board Carrick Station and Vaiken Spacedock.
A Personnel Agent who appears on both the Republic and Imperial Fleets, Estah Kloy was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the 2014 Digital Expansion Galactic Strongholds.
